Package com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.shopping

Interface Summary
CartItem An item you might be selling (an apple, a car, a one hour music lesson, etc.) It contains information such as the item name, an inventoryId that you define, a price, and a tax rate.
Discount A Discount to apply for a purchase.
Shipping Contains information about the shipping cost and tax rate.
To create a shipping cost use DomainFactory.newShipping(cost, taxrate)
TaxRates used for shipping must have a name ("Shipping Tax", etc).
ShoppingCart A container of CartItems.
It also tracks the tip that might be set for this purchase.
It can tell you the subtotal, tax total, grand total.
ShoppingCart.Builder  
TaxRate TaxRate tracks the name, rate, and id of a tax which you might apply to a CartItem.
You may have several different tax rates (for example, a tax rate for food and a different tax rate
for gas).
 

Class Summary
ShoppingCart.Formatter  
 

Enum Summary
Discount.Type The types of discounts that can be applied.
